Package model.algorithms.ants

Class PheromonesTrails

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.algorithms.ants.PheromonesTrails
  • public class PheromonesTrails
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for simulating the activity of an area. It allows you to manage the pheromones deposited by each ant in its environment. With that, we can know the paths most borrow from ants and therefore the shortest.
    Author:
    lucaspaumel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PheromonesTrails​(model.generic.Problem problem)
      Generate an array of traces representing the variables of the problem to be solved.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PheromonesTrails

        public PheromonesTrails​(model.generic.Problem problem)
        Generate an array of traces representing the variables of the problem to be solved. Each variable has zero or more alternatives. The probability of these alternatives is proportional to their number.
        Parameters:
        problem - : problem to solve containing the number of variables of this one as well as the number of alternatives for each one of them.

    • Method Detail

      • newAnt

        public model.generic.Solution newAnt​(model.generic.Problem problem,
                                     model.generic.InterfaceRandom generator)
        Build a new ant and initialize these variables. For each variable, an alternative among n is selected according to their probabilities thanks to a random draw. If no alternative is possible, the variable is set to -1.
        Parameters:
        problem - : problem to solve
        generator - : random number generator
        Returns:
        ant : One of the solutions to the problem

      • evaporated

        public void evaporated​(double dQuantitePheromoneEvaporation)
        Subtracts the quantity passed as a parameter from the probabilities of the alternatives for each variable.
        Parameters:
        dQuantitePheromoneEvaporation -

      • reward

        public void reward​(model.generic.Problem problem,
                   model.generic.Solution ant,
                   double dQuantitePheromoneAjout)
        Rewards the ant passed in parameter. Addition of a quantity of pheromones to the table of traces of pheromones corresponding to the active variables of the ant.
        Parameters:
        problem - : Probelm to solve
        ant - : One of the solutions to the problem
        dQuantitePheromoneAjout - : Value reward

      • adjustPheromonTrail

        public void adjustPheromonTrail​(double dQuantiteMini)
                         throws PheromonesException
        Adjust the probabilities of the alternatives so that their sums make 1.0 on each variable in the pheromone trace table. If on one of the alternatives the quantity of pheromone is lower than dQuantiteMini then this quantity is equal to dQuantiteMini.
        Parameters:
        dQuantiteMini - : Minimum quantity of pheromone on a variable in the trace table.
        Throws:
        PheromonesException - : If dQuantiteMini is <0 or if Mini Quantity> 1 divided by the number of alternatives of one of the variables in the pheromone trace table.
